full_summary:
# Divisional Psychologists

## Request for Proposal

The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) is requesting proposals from qualified psychologians to provide clinical psychological assessments and specialized services.

## Evaluation Criteria

* Bidders must demonstrate expertise in clinical psychology and relevant experience in fitness for duty, disability management, and performance-related issues.
* The lowest evaluated price will be recommended for award.

## Tender Details

* **Reference Number:** cb-968-53791694
* **Publication Date:** November 8, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** December 13, 2023, 15:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** April 1, 2024
* **Expected Contract End Date:** None (with option to extend for up to 3 additional years)

## Respective Responsibilities

* Bidders for "F" Division must be available to provide services for either 40 hours per week, Monday to Friday, or 20 hours per week, Monday to Friday, with additional hours as required by the RCMP.
* Bidders for "T" Division must be available to provide services for 20 hours per week, Monday to Friday, with additional hours as required by the RCMP.

## Contact Information

* For more information, contact Dino Cavalic at dino.cavalic@rcmp-grc.gc.ca or (587) 335-6809.

## Mandatory Documents

* Refer to the attached tender documents for further information.
* The solicitation and all amendments may be found on the Government Electronic Tendering Service (GETS) website.

## Bidding Requirements

* Tenders must be submitted to the RCMP Bid Receiving Unit at NWR_Procurement_Bids@rcmp-grc.gc.ca.
* Tenders must comply with the requirements outlined in the bid solicitation and meet all mandatory technical evaluation criteria.
